 A specialization theorem, mostly the same as Theorem 19.8 of [Margaris] p. 89.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)  (Proof rewritten by Jim Kingdon, 29-Dec-2017.)
statement: spsbe $p |- ( [ y / x ] ph -> E. x ph ) $.
